title: Jack Willowfang & the Island of Terroria
description: Tragedy seems to follow Jack Willowfang wherever he goes. As a young boy, a heartbreaking event leaves him scarred and fated toward a life of destruction.Now as a quick-tempered, awkward teenager, Jack lives a lonely and troubled life in the small fishing town of Scuttleman’s Wharf. All along he remains completely unaware of the danger that surrounds him, until one day he encounters a frightening, otherworldly individual who takes the life of his only loved one. Struck by tragedy once again, Jack is left feeling lost, alone and utterly devastated.But when offered a chance at revenge by a mysterious stranger, Jack is forced to make a daring choice that will change the course of his life forever. His decision ultimately leads him to the secret Island of Terroria, an impossible land filled with bizarre creatures and even more bizarre people...not to mention terrifying beasts that should only exist in one’s nightmares.
author: Bree Jourdan
